title: Justices Grapple with Texas Abortion Law
itunes:title: Justices Grapple with Texas Abortion Law
description:
Constitutional law professor Leah Litman of the University of Michigan Law School, discusses the Supreme Court justices grappling with the power of the federal judiciary to block Texas’ ban on abortion, the most restrictive law in the country.

Immigration law expert Leon Fresco, a partner at Holland & Knight, discusses a jury awarding more than $17 million in back pay to immigrants for work in a detention center, and other immigration issues.

June Grasso hosts.

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
